ComicInfo.Summary:
The Pathfinder adventurers barely survived their first confrontation with Black Fang. How will they endure now that the dragon is empowered by Thelsikar's dark magic? The second Pathfinder adventure ends with wall to wall action. The hit comic series based on Paizo's incredible award-winning fantasy world, fiction line and tabletop RPG continues! Sword & sorcery fans and gamers alike will enjoy this latest chapter from Paizo Publishing and Dynamite Entertainment.
